Fyfe is a multi-disciplinary consultancy providing comprehensive engineering, environmental, planning and surveying services throughout Australia. With over 1000 employees, Fyfe delivers projects with a wide range of clients in the Property & Infrastructure, Energy & Resources, Defence and Renewables sectors to provide high quality, commercially pragmatic solutions with a strong focus on client service and delivery.

Fyfe is looking for a high-impact Corporate Reporting and Analytics Manager who will sit at the heart of the business, turning complex project and financial data into clear, actionable insights that directly influence performance, client outcomes, and decision-making. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to understand business needs and deliver data-driven insights.

Identify process inefficiencies and design improved future-state workflows.

Drive continuous improvement initiatives and support cultural change toward data-driven decision-making.

Your background and experience:

Ability to quickly learn project management systems and act as a key liaison between business unit teams and data outputs.

Tertiary qualifications in Business, Commence, Data Analytics, or a related field.

Strong financial modelling capability with advanced Excel skills; experience with Power BI, Power Query and/or SQL Server Databases is PREFERRED.

Demonstrated experience in financial analysis or commercial finance within project-based or complex operating environments.

Confident communicator with the ability to educate and influence non-financial stakeholders.

High attention to detail and accuracy, with the ability to perform effectively in a lean, fast-paced environment.

Previous experience in, and motivated by, working in a professional services environment.
